```{r functions}
score_model <- function(model, train_subset, test_raw, time_sec) {
  A <- nrow(train_subset) / 60000
  B <- min(1, time_sec / 60)
  px_cols <- paste0("pixel", 1:49)
  preds <- predict(model, newdata = test_raw[, ..px_cols])
  C <- mean(preds != test_raw$label)
  Points <- 0.15 * A + 0.10 * B + 0.75 * C
  list(A = A, B = B, C = C, Points = Points)
}


```

```{r load_data}

test_path  <- here::here("data", "MNIST-fashion testing set-49.csv")

train_raw <- data.table::fread(train_path)
test_raw  <- data.table::fread(test_path)
```

```{r generate_samples}
# plot
```
